divs: Sighting Detailsat home in hot tub looking up at orion's belt then lights appeared out of the blackness at least 10 lights flying circling each other, then forming standard airplane like formations then circling each other again. they had pulsating lights that followed same sequences and brightness pattern i alerted friend who saw them too, then after five min. they left then returned then left, a total of 3 known times
trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There was one other sighting in Los Angeles on or around March 3rd 2012
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: an airiel display of flying figure 8's and in various formations such as a v
